text:
Hi, Guys,
 
My name is Edward Bishop - I am a CoreCommerce marketing specialist. 
 
The Core Platform provides businesses, web developers, ISOs/agents, and software partners with the tools to seamlessly accept online payments.
 
We also have our own corporate blog where we share our ideas and stories.
 
Here - <https://www.corecommerce.com/blog/>
 
Now we accept guest contributors from other experts in different niches, and we are ready for any collaborations related to links
 
If you're interested in this, feel free to email me here or at - <mailto:edwardbishop.mx@gmail.com|edwardbishop.mx@gmail.com>

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?
